slide.title: PHP Config
slide.blurb: A little-known PHP build option lets you have multiple .ini files which can be very handy.
slide.example: include_path = /usr/local/lib/php:. display_errors = Off max_execution_time = 30 post_max_size = 8M file_uploads = Off safe_mode = Off enable_dl = Off display_startup_errors = Off log_errors = On error_reporting = E_ALL html_errors = Off track_errors = Off magic_quotes_gpc = Off magic_quotes_runtime = Off magic_quotes_sybase = Off expose_php = Off allow_url_fopen = Off register_globals = Off register_argc_argv = On variables_order = "GPC" gpc_order = "GPC" extension = input_filter.so
